ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains procedures used to identify patients who were discharged against medical advice or elopement.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of the value set is to identify a patient discharged against medical advice. The QDM Category linked to this value set: Attribute),(Inclusion Criteria: Include SNOMED CT codes representing leaving against medical advice.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude codes that do not meet the inclusion criteria.)
